message: Let's get this started! I'm being generous, but I'm also aware of the diminishing value of money.  Let's be practical.  Accept this and we both win.
Meet me halfway, let's settle this quickly!
I'm still willing to be fair, but I need a bigger share to make up for the inflation.  Let's make this happen before we both lose more money!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
Look, Bob. We're losing money every round. If we don't come to an agreement soon, we'll both end up with nothing. This offer is the best I can do, let's be reasonable.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, Alice. You're not being reasonable, so I'm taking control of the negotiations.
Bob, we're running out of time! If we keep rejecting each other, we'll both lose everything. This offer is a compromise. Let's end this stalemate and get what we can before it's too late.
I'm not budging, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share now that the stakes are higher.
Bob, this is our last chance! If we both keep being stubborn, we'll get nothing! This offer is fair, considering how much money we've already lost. Please, let's end this before it's too late!
I'm not going to let you get away with taking the majority of the money. I'm taking a huge share now, and you'll get a tiny fraction.
Bob, we're both losing a fortune. This is our last chance to salvage anything. Let's split it down the middle, or we'll both get nothing.
